website_summaries.verdict: Fun, fast UNO play with a Potter-themed twist, at a very reasonable price.
pros: Standard UNO gameplay, but with an added Sorting Hat rule card and cards in Hogwarts house colors
Extra wild card adds a fun twist to the game, and players are encouraged to yell out a spell rather than "Uno" when they reach their last card
cons: Storage box is flimsy and can be easily damaged
Added rules may take time to figure out

customer_reviews.title: Very fun with extra twist!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun for my little Harry Potter fan! We love Uno and card games and so the Harry Potter version just seemed like extra decoration, but there's actually an additional Harry Potter exclusive Wild Card with a different rule! I will say, if you don't know the colors for the houses, the rules are a bit confusing, as in it refers to "Slytherin" card instead of "green" card. But my HP fan can quickly tell me which house belongs to which color!
customer_reviews.author: MelTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as earlier edition.
customer_reviews.text: This variation on Uno is fun, but I have played Harry Potter Uno before and the deck had some other very interesting cards such as an invisibility cloak card that this deck does not have. There was another specialty card missing as well. While this is fun, it is not as cool as the other edition of the game. The art work on the cards isn't as fun either. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry W.

customer_reviews.title: harry potter uno II cards.
customer_reviews.text: the original set was a great game. I wish this set had all the same cards as the original , plus the new ones that this set has , but this is still a fun set . We actually mix an old set with the new set for a real fun game. Can't go wrong with these. I bought a set for all my grown children to mix with their old sets.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Potter and Uno fans unite!
customer_reviews.text: Uno has been the perfect card game since forever so that needs no review. I was expecting a standard Uno deck with Harry Potter themes added in and that's true. But they have also added a special twist to the game which I will no spoil but its definitely cute and adds a new dimension to the game. Its doesn't turn the rules on its head and you adjust to the change immediately. I will definitely check out more speciality decks to see if they do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Cards are thin and very low quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've had UNO sets that have lasted me for decades, so it was a no brainer for me to buy this set for my lovely girlfriend as a gift. When we first played with them I was shocked at just how cheap these cards felt. If this set was at a bar or used frequently, they wouldn't last a week. Of course the game works just fine and the product arrived as described, but I am really disappointed with the low quality of material. The cards' edges are rounded, but those aren't the only corners that UNO cuts nowadays. The extra rule is a fun addition, though, hence the extra star.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Novelty/Classic games rule
customer_reviews.text: I love a novelty spin on a classic game. I am not going to go into have many version of Monopoly we have. I will say though we did have to look up the rule for the classic UNO online because my BF and his daughter were taught to play it in a different way and I was taught to play it by the classic rules. So a fight ensued and the game has been put up since but I do plan on breaking it back out later when I am around others that play the game by the rules or to teach grandkids how to play.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Haynes

customer_reviews.title: for die-hard Harru Potter  Fans only
customer_reviews.text: my children and grandchildren play the original game frequently. So I thought this would be good variant to have. Bad choice. Worst thing is the horrible colors used. Difficult to distinguish between green and blue. I am 81 and found the colors ugly. Secondly the instructlions appear to have been writen ins Yiddish, then translated into French, then to Chinese and finally into English. Difficult to follow. Unless you are a collector, save your money,
customer_reviews.author: Duane De Vries

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This UNO deck is a must have for any Harry Potter fan and UNO lover like myself.
customer_reviews.author: PaigeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: A fun twist to UNO
customer_reviews.text: My little family LOVES games. They don't think regular UNO has much of a challenge for them. So, seeing a Harry Potter version, I knew they would love it, since they are HP obsessed. My kids love this version so much, sometimes even playing a round before school. They love the look and characters, of course. They absolutely love playing the "special card" against each other. I love their endless, whole-hearted laughing during this game. It is definitely one of our favorite versions of UNO.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Davis

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed the pictures and how to play new UNO
customer_reviews.text: Easy to play. Hp fans love my uno game. To me it looks like characters from the second And third movie. It’s Dobby the free house Elf, Harry Potter, Ronald Weasley, Hermione Granger, professor McGonagle, professor Snape, professor Dumbledore, Dementors, sorting hat. Fitch, Hagrid. Group pictures of Draco Malfoy and his friends, Vincent Crabbe, Gregory Goyle. Also He who must not be named. The picture of professor dumbledore is from movies 1-2. Not 3-7.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Anthony Boudreaux Jr

customer_reviews.title: Fun twist on a classic game
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun! Uno is a fun and fairly easy game for kids to learn. I have two elementary aged kids and they love it. They also love Harry Potter and this version is a fun twist on a classic game. Cards are cute and well-designed. I only wish they included Hedwig on one of the cards :) Great for kids, adults, gifts or anyone who likes Harry Potter stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holtkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great for Harry Potter fans
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this game. I wish when cards were brighter. They are dull and not very fun as compared to regular Uno cards. The extra rule makes the game a little more thrilling but I feel the rule should be tied to a house rather than drawing till you get a Gryffindor character.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: It's UNO with Harry Potter characters
customer_reviews.text: There is one different rule in this version of UNO. There is a wild card with a sorting hat. When played - the person can choose any player to have to pick cards until they get a Gryffindor character (cards #1-4). Other than that, it's the standard game. I was disappointed in how thin these cards are. The edges get beat up fairly quickly with people picking them up and with shuffling.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Dark colors and shiny cards ... only go for a HP nut/fan
customer_reviews.text: The cards colors are so dark that in lower light it is difficult to tell what colors was played, turn on the lights and the glare of the shiny cards is almost as bad. I didn't like the special card that differed from standard Uno, but my daughter is the HP nut and insisted we use it. I bought them for her, otherwise I'd stick with a standard Uno deck.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Potterheads need this!
customer_reviews.text: I just realized there is a Harry Potter version of UNO cards! I had no hesitation to buy this. The box may be slightly damaged, but what matters is that the cards are intact. What I realized after I bought this is that other customers complained about the similar issue. The seller needs to fix this, and package the cards with a new box. I cannot wait to play with it, though!
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Good game with a twist
customer_reviews.text: Great game with a cool new rule! Unfortunately my husband is color blind and these cards are much darker than original Uno colors so we did have a harder time playing. Just be sure to have lots of light even I had trouble with the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors are bright and cards are a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Ok first, I am a HUGE Harry Potter nerd and I love Harry Potter. That being said, I wasn’t too impressed with this. It just doesn’t feel like UNO to me which is probably why. The colors aren’t very bright which is a big UNO aspect and I felt as if the cards were a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Im a UNO game collector, heres my thoughts on it.
customer_reviews.text: It is very much alike the original UNO game. But it has special cards that are super fun! I used to have a group of friends where we all brought our own games and I always brought UNO to start off or end the gaming (Which they all loved) Uno is a very simple and addicting game in my opinion. Someone brought the Harry Potter UNO version a phew times and I knew I had to have it! Harry Potter may be my favorite version of UNO. Would definelty buy again or even gift it to someone. (Im a hufflepuff if you couldnt tell. :P)
customer_reviews.author: Elyce

customer_reviews.title: Great gift - daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The cards were in their original plastic wrap. The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is that the box was unglued when I opened the package. Fortunately, I was able to glue it back together with some patience and rubber bands.
customer_reviews.author: hodewa

customer_reviews.title: Add to the fun of the Uno game with Harry Potter cards.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and I love Harry Potter so it is lots of fun to play a few games...10 lol. It just makes it fun.
customer_reviews.author: Teachtfuture

customer_reviews.title: Themed Uno is a great game for family and friends!
customer_reviews.text: These Harry Potter cards were bought for a collector of HP things. I just ordered a second pack after I was told she wasn't planning to open the first pack. She wanted to keep them like new! No way! And I should have thought of that in the first place. Great price and good, sturdy quality for many, many games to be played!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards, special rule included
customer_reviews.text: I love to play UNO and love Harry Potter, so when I saw the game with Harry Potter theme, I of course had to buy it. The cards are beautiful and it includes a special rule for the game. Besides that, it's basically the same UNO that everybody knows, easy to play and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Fiorillo

customer_reviews.title: Pandemic Savior
customer_reviews.text: This game has sustained my family through the pandemic quarantine...it is played every day, sometimes multiple times a day. We are true Potterheads, and that has added to the enjoyment of the game. This set comes with a unique “sorting hat card” that makes you draw until you pull a Gryffindor- so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Hours of slytherin fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever thought how different can you get with uno like seriously while they did lol. Harry Potter fans you got to get it we do not get tired of it this game thought we might but we don't. We play it weekly and it last for hours and can even have lots of fun just two players!
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Will be a fun game
customer_reviews.text: If the box had arrived properly intact then I'm sure the item would have been giftable.....however something happened to the shipping box and other items in the shipment. I was able to save the cards, however I will have to put them in a zip lock baggie as the original box is not salvageable.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great for Harry potter fans
customer_reviews.text: This uno is played a bit differently than the original one. Our granddaughter loves Harry Potter so was thrilled to get this for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, but handling was definitely poor!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it, but I’m a bit disappointed that one corner is crushed. Besides that, I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: SOPHIE

customer_reviews.title: Uno with a Twist
customer_reviews.text: Just like regular Uno but with a few twists. Unfortunately you have to keep the rules with you because remembering what all the different wildcards do is impossible. My daughter is a huge Harry Potter fan and she loves playing this game
customer_reviews.author: J. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter Uno is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love a game of Uno??? Get this edition of Harry Potter Uno for all your Harry Potter fans and no one will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Judy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for HP fans
customer_reviews.text: Love it I just wish the green was more of a kelly green as it's sometimes hard to tell the blue from the green. Otherwise, it's a fun play on the original uno game of big HP fans like me.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: A fun classic game with a few new twists. Easy to learn how to play. It helps if you are familiar with the Hogwarts houses. It is a new game how ever you can see from the package that the box to the cards is riped on both sides so I taped up the box, which is why I am leaving it only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great family fun for all ages and the rules are simple and easy for even my five year old to understand. It brings laughter and fun to the table and my girls love Harry Potter too so this was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter liked it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Grand daughter enjoys Harry Potter. She was excited to get this small gift from us for her birthday. She soon was teaching us how to play and her grand parents and her enjoyed the game
customer_reviews.author: James. Backus

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game for $5!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. My boyfriend and I are huge Harry Potter fans, so I was excited to order this product, especially for such a low price. It arrived very quickly, in pristine condition, and it was very quick to learn. Much like the original Uno game, but with some added twists! We enjoyed playing the game, and it's easy to travel with so that you can play anywhere you go!
customer_reviews.author: A_Wal14

customer_reviews.title: Classic card game, meets cool novelty!
customer_reviews.text: My 25 year old daughter is still upset she never received her letter to Hogwarts. She continues to be obsessed with Harry Potter, so this purchase was a no brainer! She loved this little stocking stuffer, and I loved watching her play her favorite game with her little brothers and sisters! Excellent value for a classic card game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Box was ripped a little
customer_reviews.text: This is a new product but the box came a little ripped. Not the biggest issue, but this is a gift for someone else so it might be helpful for others to know. I have a picture but there isn’t an option to post my picture with my review. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Buy At Your Own Risk
customer_reviews.text: Cursed game. Almost destroyed my family but it was fun! Love the extra rule with the sorting hat! Definitely go for it, unless you have a terrible temper or hate unpredictable games. Excellent for the price. Uno is... Unlike any other game.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect UNO game!
customer_reviews.text: I love UNO so much and I live for Harry Potter, now I get to have both at one time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for family game night
customer_reviews.text: We have a mix of Potterheads and non-Potterheads in my family and the game was still fun for everyone. We loved the special game play cards!
customer_reviews.author: Sharmi

customer_reviews.title: Okay Twist on Uno
customer_reviews.text: Some HP specific rules make this twist kind of fun. Wish the photos and design on the cards were better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ja'anai Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game for a Harry Potter fan
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be regular uno with Harry Potter characters on them and it turns out they added a couple different rules which makes it even more fun! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun card game!
customer_reviews.text: Was really pleased to receive this card game It is a gift for many children to enjoy. So yes, this is giftable, a great value for the money and the game is easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vars

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, one additional card
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved these cards. We spent hours as a family playing. There is only one additional card from a traditional uno game and even if you do not know the books or movies the directions make it easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: flgirl

customer_reviews.title: Potter!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun version of Uno. Make sure to shuffle well, because if someone throws down the 9 3/4 card and you don't get a Gryffindor card, you will have a handful of cards!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be A muggle- buy them
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves Harry Potter so I bought these for her and I also got a sack for my children they love playing with them the cards are super thick and it’s Harry Potter
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lemke

customer_reviews.title: Reallt cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Was thrilled when my daughter found these online. Did not know they even existed... She was happy it made its way into her Christmas stocking...super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Uno Harry Potter
customer_reviews.text: If you are a big Harry Potter fan this is a must have! Came fast and is in great condition. The colors and pictures are gorgeous. Glad I bought this game!
customer_reviews.author: Susan's Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Day's of fun with my grandson
customer_reviews.text: It's simply what it's supposed to be. It's a classic game with two fun changes made especially for Harry Potter fans. They're a great interactive gift. The only slightly negative is there are a lot of cards and they need to be spread on the table to be shuffled, but my grandson loved that part
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great HP design
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for my Potterhead. Typical Uno cards, but with Harry Potter. My nine year old enjoys playing with them and so far my three year old hasn’t ripped any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Cards are ok but box is not.
customer_reviews.text: The cards are sealed and appear fine. Card box however is another matter. It smells like lotion and is moist. Had to throw away due to smell and wetness. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just so you know

customer_reviews.title: These are # UNO with us
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our vacation to Universal. With everything closing early now a days this will be a good time when we are stuck in the hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Green

customer_reviews.title: Love UNO
customer_reviews.text: Great game- box arrived all beat up like it was sitting on the floor of amazon warehouse for a week being kicked around, but all the cards were in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: WW47

customer_reviews.title: A fun twist for Harry Potter fans
customer_reviews.text: My son prefers this version over regular Uno. He likes Mario Bros Uno too, but picks this one more often. Fun twist on Uno with the sorting hat rule.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for friends or family game night!
customer_reviews.text: Potter nerds you will LOVE this. We have so much fun as a family with this game. The added card the Sorting Hat gives it that extra special addition while still staying true to the original Uno game. The cards held up to my 8 year olds bending. This is a great family fun night game.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a HP birthday party
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful game to play while celebrating a HP themed birthday party. My 4 year old son even part took, with a little help. A must for all HP fans!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat the Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great for Harry Potter fans
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister who read the first book of Harry Potter. It has all the characters of the first book, but not some of the other characters, like Luna Lovegood or Sirius Black.
customer_reviews.author: Rizvi

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this is great... as another reviewer mentioned its just UNO, but harry potter version and thats just what it is. why not have the cool harry potter set while playing?
customer_reviews.author: Racquelle

customer_reviews.title: I approve
customer_reviews.text: It’s harry Potter and Uno together. We are fans of both. The colors are clear and bright on the cards. We are still learning how to use the special cards. The price was great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Box might be damaged. Not for Collecting.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously We all love UNO, all love Harry Potter. I'm. Not sure about HP game play. I bought it as a gift, but the box was slightly damaged. Wouldnt matter, but the person I bought it for "Collects" HP stuff. So its not really collectable or gift able in this state. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kayti

customer_reviews.title: Great for Harry Potter fans.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece's birthday. She plays UNO with my boyfriend when she has the chance. She's also a Harry Potter fan, so she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Price was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for these for a gift! The price was exactly what I wanted to pay. The cards came in new packaging and good condition. Happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Jones

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that is difficult with these cards is the colors are hard to distinguish. They are all dark, so the green, blue and red all look the same to my family.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: For the buno and Harry Potter fan
customer_reviews.text: If you like the game Uno and love Harry Potter, then this is the game for you. Plays just like the original UNO, except the cards have the characters on them from the Harry Potter movies.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Love them .
customer_reviews.text: Teaching my son numbers and colors. Same price as the regular ones at the store . So better value since its a theme . Keeps kids excited. Good for daycare.works with uno attack.
customer_reviews.author: Classic Generation

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old’s birthday and he LOVED it. We’ve played at least 4x a week and brought it to extended family game night where a few people threatened to borrow it. It’s the same basic premise as traditional Uno with some Harry Potter magic cards thrown in. The new cards were confusing at first, but the included instructions made it easy to figure out. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift.
customer_reviews.text: Good deck of uno cards. Daughter is super into Harry Potter now. Only complaint is I wish the had faction crest and different poses on different colors. Kinda standardized but wonderful for small bday or stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my little Harry Potter fan! The price was great compared to others that only had a tin box difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgszet

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter revamps UNO!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter who is a huge Harry Potter fan! She loves them, and likes that most of the characters are on the cards.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great game for Harry Potter fans
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are amazing and it's so fun to play. I would have made the bad card Voldemort or a dementor rather than the sorting hat.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Group game
customer_reviews.text: Different rules then normal UNO. High quality cards with beautiful graphics. Lots of fun for all ages and a good group game.
customer_reviews.author: marijane

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any potterhead!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old loves this game! She's recently into HP and I thought it was a great way to bridge something she loves with a game we can play as a family.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyh

customer_reviews.title: Great Potter Gift
customer_reviews.text: Same as regular Uno fake hair a a Harry Potter theme .. was a gift to my Potterhead adult child and she loved them ..
customer_reviews.author: johnsmom

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Daughter (adult) loves Harry Potter. Bought as small gift. Uno is an easy game to learn even for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Zerhusen

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok...
customer_reviews.text: Cards are a bit small... that’s my only complaint. If you’re a grown adult these might be noticeably small when handling. The print is crisp though! They’re ok.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudrider

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter Uno
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for your Harry Potter fan. Standard Uno game with a Harry Potter theme. My gift recipient cherished this set.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Baylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! My 5 year old and 9 year old LOVE this game! Easy to learn, fun to play. Great price. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: mm springfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stocking Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Fun Harry Potter twist on Uno for any Harry Potter loving kids our there. This was a great stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Cgreene

customer_reviews.title: Fun Uno game
customer_reviews.text: The family enjoyed playing this. It has a bonus Harry Potter exclusive rule, which the kids thought was fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter had wanted "anything" Harry Potter. That it was a card game she could play was a huge bonus
customer_reviews.author: Syrenity

customer_reviews.title: Great version of Uno!
customer_reviews.text: My students are enjoying this version of Uno. You should have knowledge of Harry Potter before playing .
customer_reviews.author: shannonk

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Harry Potter!!!! My children and I have always played board games or card games 4 days a week and this has made UNO our #1 choice. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stravis2012

customer_reviews.title: fun UNO game! Kids were so excited
customer_reviews.text: We have Cinderella UNO, original UNO and now Harry Potter UNO. My 9 and 10 year old were so excited when I gave it to them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Gift for HP fan
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my sister. She loves playing UNO and is a HP fan so this is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna K

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for Uno players
customer_reviews.text: Part of a gift...cards are smaller, standard card size. I think the Grandkids will really like them.
customer_reviews.author: MomsCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter card playing fans must have
customer_reviews.text: Must have for those that love Harry Potter and care games. Excited to give to family members for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry stirling

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 6 and his mother has read him all the Harry Potter books and LOVES them.. and loves the game UNO! So he was thrilled with the cards!
customer_reviews.author: KLG

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It made a good gift, however the box that the cards are in came a little beat up and looked as if it has some wear and tear on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Walsh

customer_reviews.title: It's Harry Potter uno what's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: We love this game. The extra card is awesome. It's a sorting hat card! It definitely adds to the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a Potter fan
customer_reviews.text: Brought this as a gift for a Potter fan that likes to play Uno. I have not seen the cards myself.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Hard to see the different variations of cards. In face the kids asked me to get out the original ink as they were having a hard time. The concept is cute. The colors just need to be easier to see
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat uno and Harry Potter!
customer_reviews.text: If you like Harry Potter then you’ll love this game.. colors are bright.. everyone on the cards resemble Their charactor.
customer_reviews.author: SANDY FORST

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: The cards are durable, the game is fun and the images are excellent, very good gift for Harry Potter fans
customer_reviews.author: Graciela

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Great card game to play with the family. The addition of the new cards to the game made for an exciting experience.
customer_reviews.author: Rune Trevaine

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 8 year old grandchild. Loves uno and Harry Potter so am sure he will like this.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A fun version of Uno. Nothing too different. Something a little different for my Harry Potter loving, game playing 7 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: tkspears

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun with a great twist!
customer_reviews.text: The cards are pliable so you can easily shuffle them. The game is supposed fun with the sorting hat!
customer_reviews.author: JeepCruiser12

customer_reviews.title: Good game for the price
customer_reviews.text: We play normal Uno all the time, and Avengers Marvel Uno, so I though Harry Potter would be a cute spin to add to our Uno nights. My son and wife both liked the variety from the prior versions we played and the cards were well made.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Uno Deck
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my fellow harry potter lover and best friend and I to play in school! Good quality, super cool designs.
customer_reviews.author: GraceCM

customer_reviews.title: Love the different rules!
customer_reviews.text: We love that it's Harry Potter themed, and that it has a few different rules than just regular Uno.
customer_reviews.author: hkf

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly different from the original, but the difference adds fun! Great for HP fans!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie and Scott

product_meta.title: UNO Harry Potter
product_meta.description: It's the fun, fast-paced card game you love now featuring iconic characters from the world of Harry Potter! Join Harry, Hermione, Ron, Professor Dumbledore and more of your favorite characters from Hogwarts for a night of UNO gameplay. Players race to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the deck. Score points by being the first to get rid of all the cards in your hand. Special action cards deliver game-changing moments as they each perform a function to help you defeat your opponents. There's even a special Sorting Hat Rule Card! When you play this card, another player of your choice must keep drawing cards until they find a Gryffindor card! Other action cards include Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos, and Wild Cards. First player or team to 500 wins – and when you're down to one card, don't forget to yell "UNO!" A great gift for Harry Potter fans, age 7 and older. Contains 112 cards plus instructions. For 2 to 10 players, ages 7 and older. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: ​Now you can play UNO in the company of your favorite Harry Potter characters! Same gameplay as Basic UNO but features images of Hermione, Harry, Ron, and other characters from the magical world of Harry Potter!
​The goal is to get rid of all the cards in your hand, and the first player or team to 500 points wins.
​Special action cards include Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos, and Wild cards.
​Sorting Hat card makes another player of our choice keep drawing cards until they get a Gryffindor card!
​A wonderful gift for Harry Potter fans, age 7 and older. Contains 112 cards plus instructions. Colors and decorations may vary.
